mapper.sql: id, car_brand, so_id, car_type, mean_temperature, create_time, update_time, below_standard_number
mapper.update:
UPDATE car_avg_temperature
car_brand = #{carBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
so_id = #{soId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
car_type = #{carType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
mean_temperature = #{meanTemperature,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
below_standard_number = #{belowStandardNumber,jdbcType=TINYINT},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
